sentence.Network_en: Malolactic fermentation ( MLF ) is a very important processing technology for deacidificaton in modern winemaking.
sentence.Network_cn: 苹果酸乳酸发酵 ( MLF ) 是现代葡萄酒酿造工艺中重要的生物降酸手段.

sentence.Network_en: In an ideal winemaking world, extended cold soaking would be preferred 90 out of 100 times.
sentence.Network_cn: 在理想的酿酒世界中, 十有八九都愿意采用延长冷浸渍时间的作法.
